snippet: With no hands-on technology experience and a tight deadline, the entrepreneur Jeffrey D. Zients is leading the effort to fix HealthCare.gov.
abstract: Profile of Jeffrey D Zients, multimillionaire entrepreneur and management consultant, who has become emergency fix-it man charged with righting HealthCare.gov; Zients is set to become Pres Obama's top economic adviser in January 2014.
lead_paragraph: With no hands-on technology experience and a tight deadline, the entrepreneur Jeffrey D. Zients is leading the effort to fix HealthCare.gov.

headline.main: Health Website Tests a Tycoon and Tinkerer
headline.print_headline: Health Website Tests a Tycoon And Tinkerer
